
5 '*** INVERSION VIDEO RAPIDE ***
10 CLS:DEFINTA-Z:GOTO30
15 REM012345678901234567890123456
20 REM012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012
30 RESTORE15:A1=PEEK(&H329)*256+PEEK(&H328)+6
40 FORI=0TO26:READB:POKEA1+I,B:NEXT
50 RESTORE20:A2=PEEK(&H329)*256+PEEK(&H328)+6:RESTORE10000
60 FORI=0TO62:READB:POKEA2+I,B:NEXT
65 EXECA2:A0=A1ç256:A1=A1MOD256
100 '
105 B$=" BONJOUR DU CLUB C7 "
110 FORK=1TO5:POKE41,A1:POKE42,A0
120 LOCATE0,1:PRINTB$:FORI=1TO150:NEXT
130 POKE41,&H8F:POKE42,&HE8:LOCATE0,1:PRINTB$:FORI=1TO150:NEXT
140 NEXTK:END
150 'DONNEES L.M.
9980 DATA197,213,229,245,254,32,218,215,193,254,64,48,4,198,96,24,7,254,96
9990 DATA210,198,193,198,160,195,198,193
10000 DATA062,255,017,096,032,006,032,245,197,213,122,001,008,001,017,111
10010 DATA002,033,212,001,119,062,027,205,047,201,235,006,008,062,252,150
10020 DATA119,035,016,249,209,033,110,002,122,131,119,001,000,009,062,026
10030 DATA205,047,201,193,020,016,209,241,060,192,017,160,064,024,198
